modName: Illusion Of Power - Power Of Illusion
summary: Makes all the NPC-effecting illusion spells more powerful
descriptionHtml:
EDIT: This mod might screw up the cost of the spells. For example, Harmony needing over 1200 magicka to cast. I don\'t know how to fix this.

This mod simply makes illusion spells much more powerful, since in vanilla game, after level 60+ hardly any enemies are affected by these spells, even if you are the Master Of The Mind and have 100 illusion.

Without any perks, these numbers tell how big lvl
enemies your spells will affect.

Fury 12
Frenzy 30
Mayhem 60

Calm  15
Pacify 30
Harmony 60

Fear 20
Rout 35
Hysteria 60

Of course the master level spells are always more powerful than this, since your illusion lvl is so high.
author: Rafalema
